definition: of grammatical gender, a gender that refers chiefly (but not exclusively) to inanimate objects (neither masculine nor feminine), remove the ovaries of
details:
adjective
- of grammatical gender
= example: of grammatical gender
= synonyms: masculine
- having no or imperfectly developed or nonfunctional sex organs
= synonyms: sexless
noun
- a gender that refers chiefly (but not exclusively) to inanimate objects (neither masculine nor feminine)
verb
- remove the ovaries of
= synonyms: castrate, alter, spay
